allowlistReasons.drew@dcyfr.ai: Public contact email for portfolio owner (DCYFR Labs); intentionally published in site configuration for contact purposes.
allowlistReasons.docs/ai/LOGGING_SECURITY.md: Contains definitions/explanations of 'Proprietary' rather than actual proprietary data. Allowed for educational/documentation purposes.
allowlistReasons.docs/features/google-indexing-api.md: Contains an example service account JSON for developer guidance; keys are placeholders and redacted in examples.
allowlistReasons.src/__tests__/**: Test fixtures and sample data; intentionally includes placeholder addresses.
allowlistReasons.tests/**: End-to-end and integration test data that may contain example addresses or sample keys.
allowlistReasons.LICENSE.md: Public license reference; known safe content.
allowlistReasons.CONTRIBUTING.md: Contributor guidelines and examples; contains placeholder addresses for contributors.
allowlistReasons..github/DCYFR_STATEMENT.md: Repository policy statement; includes high-level guidance and placeholders.
allowlistReasons.docs/operations/content-strategy.md: Guidance and canonical content strategy; includes example addresses and content artifacts.
allowlistReasons.docs/operations/todo.md: Backlog and planning artifacts that may contain placeholder names/emails.
allowlistReasons.docs/operations/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment runbook and contact addresses for deployment artifacts.
allowlistReasons.docs/examples/**: Documentation examples that intentionally include placeholders and test addresses.
allowlistReasons.docs/templates/**: Templates used for docs and code samples; include placeholders by design.
